prompts.title: dev.kit Codex Overrides
body: - **Codex**: This prompt is intended for Codex CLI usage.
- **Normalization**: Prefer prompts generated by `dev.kit prompt` so Codex rules are normalized consistently.
- **Codex Config**: If `dev.kit codex apply` has been run, assume `~/.codex/AGENTS.md` and `~/.codex/rules/default.rules` are authoritative.

prompts.title: dev.kit Codex Overrides (Minimal)
body: - **Codex**: This prompt is intended for Codex CLI usage.
- **Normalization**: Prefer prompts generated by `dev.kit prompt` so Codex rules are normalized consistently.
- **Codex Config**: If `dev.kit codex apply` has been run, assume `~/.codex/AGENTS.md` and `~/.codex/rules/default.rules` are authoritative.
